mintByRole(address,uint256).details: Creates `amount` new tokens for `to`, of token type `id`. See {ERC20-_mint}. Requirements: - the caller must have MINTER_ROLE.

devdoc.title: ERC20 - Mint as role - with meta-transactions

userdoc.notice: Allow minting for senders with MINTER_ROLE to mint new tokens with meta-transactions supported via ERC2771 (supports ERC20A).
